message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $20,000. I believe it will be incredibly valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but $20,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $12,000 for it.
Thanks for your interest, Bob. I understand your position, but $20,000 is already a very competitive price. Could you meet me halfway at $16,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $16,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $14,000 for the product.
